1.content:
*BEEP, BEEP*
*BEEP, BEEP*
*BEEP, BEEP*

“Ugh, not already” said 18 year old Brian as he sleepily turned off his alarm clock.

He turned his head toward the clock, looking to see what time it was. “6:01 AM… Friday,” he said aloud to himself. He slowly moved himself toward the end of the bed, and lifted himself up to get ready for school.

His bedroom, if you could call it that, was a mess. He lived with his Grandmother, in a room downstairs, which they transformed into a family-bedroom for him and his brother, since his parents lost their house. It was definitely a boys’ room, although sometimes when he cleaned it did look nice.

Brian went to his dresser for a shirt, and slipped it over his head. Clad in a white shirt, and boxer shorts, he slowly went upstairs for a quick breakfast. After making some toast with grape jelly. As soon as he was finished, he then began his morning ritual of getting ready for school.

By the time he was done with his shower, his brother was knocking on the door, “Hey, could you please hurry? I gotta go!” As soon as Brian opened the door, his brother pushed him out of the bathroom. “Wow, couldn’t you use the one downstairs?” he asked. The younger one responded, “Grandpa was using that one down there, and I really gotta go,” he said through the door. “I’m hurrying, hold your horses” Brian said, as he toweled off and got dressed. He opened the door, and his brother nearly knocked him over, rushing into the bathroom. “Wow, take it easy there,” said Brian.

Brian walked down to his room and started his computer. He wanted to check his email before he had to go to school. As soon as the computer was started, he logged into his email account, and started exploring the messages he’d gotten since last night.

“Hmm, this looks interesting,” he said as he moused over the subject of a particular email. 'Old book sale! Personal collection! One day only! Located in the old Fred Myer parking lot…’ he read. “That looks interesting… let’s check it out,” he said as he clicked on the link to open the email. Inside it read:

‘This sale is one day only, and all books must go. There are many genres to choose from so don't hesitate to come down and check them out, you wont be disappointed. Sale is from 9 am to 8 pm Saturday.’

‘Looks like this is something I should check out,’ he thought. He continued reading the email; finding that a lot of the books being sold are quite unique and have a very deep history. He was very interested, but happened to glance at the clock and noticed that he had about twenty minutes before he had to get to school, so he saved the email.

As soon as he was finished, his little brother called down, “Hey Brian, can you help me make some breakfast?”

“Just a second, I’ll be right up!” he said, signing out of his email and shutting down his computer. He got up, and went upstairs to help his brother.

While Brian was helping his brother make breakfast, he decided to grab another piece of toast. They quickly ate, grabbed their backpacks, and got to school.

Brian’s day seemed to drag on. Nothing happened in most of his classes except for schoolwork. He was happy to see the day end and ran out of the school to get home.

Once Brian was home he ran downstairs and turned his computer on. He brought up his browser, and over the next few hours, did a few searches about magical books and the types of genres that are out there. To his surprise, it seemed that there were many that delved in black magic, white magic, and quite a few others.

Towards the end of his research, Brian was resolved to get one of three types of books: Modification Magic, Alteration Magic and Anthropomorphic Magic. These three areas seemed to intrigue Brian the most.

‘Well, tomorrow is a big day,’ thought Brian, as he yawned, ‘I should probably hit the hay’. And with that, he closed the web browser, and shut down his computer.

As Brian lay in bed, trying to fall asleep all he could think about was these books and if they work, what they can do for him. He's always wondered what it would be like to get bigger… both in a muscular and fat way… He's also wondered what it would be like to get pregnant, or at least to discover the growth of his body as if he were pregnant. Something in his mind also thought that transforming into some sort of animal was very appealing.

‘Tomorrow I'll find out if magic truly exists…’ he thought, as he slowly drifted into a dreamless sleep.

111.content:
Brian woke with a start. He was excited to find a book that would help him.

As he got up, the phone rang, so he rushed to get it before his brother did.

"Hello?" asked Brian.

"Hey Brian, did I wake you?" asked Brent.

"Not really, I just woke up a few seconds before you called," replied Brian, "whats happening?"

"Not too much. Hey, I was wondering if you would like to hang out today?" asked Brent.

"Sure. Lets say around noon or so?" said Brian, as he looked at the clock.

"Yep, be there in about a half hour then," said Brent.

With that, Brian hung up, and went to get ready for the day.

About 20 minutes later, Brian was ready for the day, and was in the kitchen waiting for his friend to show up. While he was waiting, he was wondering how to get Brent to head over to the book sale so that he could get his his hands on one.

Brian was broken out of his thoughts when his friend was knocking at the door. Brian got up, and went to open the door.

"Hey Bri," said Brent.

"Heya Brent, ready to head out then?" asked Brian.

"Yep," he replied. "Oh, hey, as I was on my way here, I saw that there was a book sale in the old Fred Meyer Parking lot. Do you want to go check it out?"

"I was just going ask if we could," Brian replied, "Yeah, lets go check it out."

Brian got into Brent's car, and they drove off, heading to the old lot. Once they got there, they parked, and headed to the tent that was setup. There didn't seem to be anyone inside, but just as soon as they passed the entrance, they were greeted by an older lady dressed in gray.

"Hello you two, how are you doing? Is there anything that I can help you find?" she asked.

Before Brian could reply, Brent was already asking her about the books, and telling her what he was interested in. So, while he had her attention, Brian decided to look around, to see if he could find anything that may catch his eye.

"No, don't want to grow other appendages... hmmm... no, don't need more hair..." thought Brian as he looked through the stacks of books around him. He was starting to get discouraged, until he bumped into a stack of books, and knocked it over, revealing a small, brightly colored book, reading "Body Augmentation". He quickly picked up the stack of books that fell over, and grabbed the one that he spotted. He opened the small cover to read its contents, but before he could focus on the first word, the shopkeeper snapped the book out of his hands.

"NO! You can't read these books before purchase, otherwise you could steal the valuable spells contained within... you have to purchase this before you can look..." she stated, in a somewhat annoyed, but mystical tone.

"Okay..." replied Brian, slightly confused why she was so defensive.

"That'll be two-fifty," she said. Brian handed her three dollars, and told her to keep the change, as she placed the book in a cloth like bag, with a drawstring. She handed the book to him, and he put it in his pocket, then went to find Brent.

Brent was already outside, waiting in his car glancing at the book he had purchased.

"Hey, Brent, what book did you get?" asked Brian as he walked up to the passenger side of the car. Brent quickly put his book back in its cloth bag, and put it under his seat. "OH, nothing, just some information on transformation. What about you, what did you get?" he asked.

"I got a book called 'Body Augmentation'. I was going to take a look at what it had inside, but the old lady stopped me before I could, and said I had to buy it," said Brian, as he pulled his small bag out of his pocket and loosened the draw string.

"Hey, I don't think you should read that while in the car... might want to wait till we get to my house, okay?" said Brent, as he looked at Brain.

What does Brian do now?
1. Read the book on the way to Brent's house?
2. Wait till you get to Brent's house, its only 5 minutes away?

1112.content:
As Brent is driving, Brian cant help but think about the book and wonder if he should try it at Brent's house, or to wait until he's home. As Brent draws near his house, Brian begins to remember the last time he talked to his best friend about the interests he has. It was New Years, at Brent's house; Brian and a few other acquaintances had met up, and began talking about certain things, and one thing led to another. That night, Brent and Brian found out each others deepest desires. Brent had always wondered what it was like to transform into a female, or at least, what it was like to have boobs, and feminine features. Brian on the other hand, let Brent, and all who were at the party know, that he has always had a fascination about getting bigger. Brian wouldn't really put to words what he meant, but that night, he held his hands out in front of his stomach, miming a large belly, that really wasn't there.

Suddenly Brian was pulled out of thoughts as Brent pulled into his driveway.

"So, I can only guess what your book does, Brian," said Brent as he put the car into park, and turned off the ignition.

"Yeah, whats that?" asked Brian.

"Well, I remember what you said back a while ago, at the New Years Party, how you mimed having a big belly," he said reaching over and patting my small belly.

"Heh, yeah," said Brian, as the memory popped back into his head.

'Well, are we going to sit in this car all day, or are we going to check out these books?" asked Brent, pulling his seatbelt off.

"Lets head in, I guess," said Brian, grabbing his book, and releasing his own seatbelt.

"Hey, you know Bri, I was thinking..." Brent started, hesitantly, "I don't think you'd look half bad with a bit more weight on you."

"Really?" asked Brian, slightly blushing at the compliment.

"Oh, yeah. I mean, you look pretty good right now, got just the right amount of chub on you right now... Kind of like the ex-jock look. You know," Brent explained.

"Yeah," Brian said, looking down. His belly did stick out, a tiny bit, but did not hang over his pants button. Just a small swell. His chest was pretty solid, but had a tinge of softness to it. His upper arms, looked strong, but definitely were hidden under some cushion. Brian looked behind himself and caught a glimpse of his bubble but... Filling his 32" waist pants out nicely.

"Definitely, I mean, i wouldn't mind seeing what this book can do..." Brent said, pointing at the pouch the book was in, "do you want to find out?"

"Yes," said Brian in an almost too eager reply.

Both teens head into the house, and down into Brent's family room. Brian went to the couch and got himself comfortable, and opened the drawstring on the small bag that the book was placed in. He quickly pulled the pocket sized book out, and began to read its contents...

"Wow, there's all sorts of stuff in here. It seems that they have some activation spells, whenever someone says a certain word that you pick out, you gain a specified amount of weight. Also, there are some 'Timed' spells. This is pretty awesome," said Brian excitedly.

While Brian was explaining about his book, Brent went to put his away, and came back with some Anime dvds to watch while they experimented with Brian's book. Brent got the dvds started, and came over to where Brian was sitting, and sat down himself.

"This is so cool," Brian said as Brent took a seat.

"I bet," Brent replied.

"So, there are a couple of options here, it says I can do this with a friend too... Every pound I gain, you gain too, or do you just want to see me grow?" asked Brain.

"Well, truth be told, I have wondered what it would be like to have a pot belly," he patted his flat midsection.

"Well, what will it be...?"

122.content:
About an hour later, Brian decided it was time to get ready, and check out the book sale. He got up, turned off the TV, grabbed some clothes and went upstairs to take a quick shower.

While he was undressing, he couldn't help but look in the mirror... He was about 5 foot 5 inches tall, with fair skin. His hair was brown, and face slightly cherubic in construction. He had a peach-fuzz goatee going on, with a light mustache. Looking further down, he had a light dusting of brown chest hair, between his beefy pecs. They weren't the most defined in the world, but you could tell there was muscle there, along with a bit of padding... Moving further down was his abs. Well, mostly. He's never really worked out before, but when he flexed them, you could see the outline of a six-pack. But when relaxed, it was a firm roundness that he was quite fond of. His belly had a navel that was still shallow, but had a bit of depth to it. It was also outlined in a light dusting of brown hair, forming a treasure trail down into his boxers.

He shucked off his boxer shorts, then started the shower, taking a few minutes to clean himself up. Once he was done, he toweled off, and put on his clean clothes, then went downstairs to find his shoes.

After finding his shoes and grabbing his wallet, he was out the door. He grabbed his bike, hopped on and started pedaling towards the store parking lot that had the book sale...

He arrived 20 minutes after his departure, noticing that there was a large tent in front of the closed down store. There were a few hand painted signs depicting that it was a book sale, but other than that, it seemed quite deserted.

He entered the tent, looking around seeing tables of books piled high. Some were even stacked on the ground nearly as high as he was tall. Almost immediately an elderly man walked over and greeted Brian.

"Hello! I didn't think anyone would show up. My name's Stockley... Stockley Stephens," he said, reaching out and shaking Brian's hand.

"Hi, I'm Brian," he replied.

"What are you in the market for, Brian?" asked Stockley, looking Brian up and down.

"I'm not sure, I was just coming to check out what you had. It seems quite interesting really..." he said fading off, "I'm not sure..."

"Thats okay my boy, just have a look around, I'd be happy to answer any questions you may have about any of the books..." replied Stockley, slowly moving to the back of the tent, behind a large bookshelf.

"Okay, thanks," replied Brian, as he started looking at the table in front of him. He began his search for the book of his dreams...

Almost ten minutes passed, and Brian still hasn't found anything yet. He wasn't sure what kind of modification he wanted, since there seemed to be so many of them. Out of nowhere, he felt a tap on his shoulder, and saw Stockley standing next to him.

"Might i suggest one of these two books?" He asked, presenting two rather old looking books, covered in a thick layer of dust. Stockley set them on the table, and with a large wheezy breath, blew the dust off the books so that Brian was able to see them.

The first one was titled: Pregnancy (m): Through the ages.
The second one was : Father: For the Expecting Man

"I think either of these will help you with what you seek," said Stockley, with a slight grin on his face.

"What makes you say that?" Brian asked, trying not to give away his feelings to the man.

"Well, you have a strange aura about you. I can't quite place it, but either of these will bring what you desire," he said, but then immediately continued, "but you should know, the first book contains spells that modify you so that if you have relations with either a man or a woman, you will have offspring. The second allows you to modify your appearance and allow you to experience the growth of a child inside you, but without actually having a child."

Brian's eyes lit up, hearing what each book can do. He's not sure if he wants to use the first one, since he is still in high school, even though he's about to graduate. The second seems more enticing, since it just mimics the pregnant form without having a child...



What does Brian decide....?

14.title: Other

info.brief_description: Brian receives news that will change his life...
info.description:
This is sort of an experiment interactive story.

In this story, we follow the life of a teenager named Brian (18 years old) and you get to choose his adventures.

One day, he receives an email from an unknown source, letting him know of a special book sale in the parking lot of an old grocery store.

The books allow for a few things to happen:

1 - He can get his hands on a book of spells/potions that allows for weight/muscle gain.
2 - Another type of book he can get is one that will grant him the ability to get pregnant, or go through the growth and experiences of what a pregnant woman would go through.
3 - Anthropomorphic Transformation is the last book that he can get his hands on. It allows him to transform himself into some sort of humanoid animal, of your choice.
4 - There are other possibilities available, as long as they are a mix of the above three mentioned magic books.

Please don't be afraid to add!

Please have fun!
